Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Sheraton Deira Hotel, Dubai places you in the heart of Dubai, convenient to Hamarain Centre and Al-Maktoum Stadium. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Reef Mall and Al Ghurair Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 229 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a nightclub, a health club, and an outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a nightclub, a health club, and an outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle.

A stay at Sheraton Deira Hotel, Dubai places you in the heart of Dubai, convenient to Hamarain Centre and Al-Maktoum Stadium. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Reef Mall and Al Ghurair Centre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hamarain Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Reef Mall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Al Ghurair Centre - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Al-Maktoum Stadium - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Naif Souq - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Deira City Centre - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Rashed Stadium - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Bastakiya - 3.1 km / 2 mi
Perfume Souq - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Gold Souk - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Spice Souk - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Dubai Museum - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Grand Mosque - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
BurJuman Mall - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Dubai Tennis Stadium - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Sharjah (SHJ-Sharjah Intl.) - 19.9 km / 12.4 mi

The preferred airport for Sheraton Deira Hotel, Dubai is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Sheraton Deira Hotel, Dubai is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Hotel is rebranded as Grand Excelsior Deira Hotel from Sheraton Deira with effective on 1st April 2016. Dubai Tourism Dirham Fee applies from 31.03.14 to be paid bythe guest directly at the Hotel/Hotel apartment. Following fee is applicable per bedroom per night- 20 Aed:5 star hotel/Deluxe hotel apart - 15 Aed:4 star hotel/Superior hotel apart-10 Aed :3 & 2 star hotel/Standard hotel apart-7 Aed :1
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
